00008 {
00009     namespace serialize
00010     {
00011         template<typename T>
00012         class SharedArraySerializer
00013         {
00014             public:
00015                 typedef T value_type;
00016                 typedef datastruct::SharedArray<T> shared_array_type;
00017                 typedef boost::shared_ptr<shared_array_type> shared_array_ptr;
00018 
00019             public:
00020                 static serialize::BaseResult_ptr serialize(boost::any& data)
00021                 {
00022                     shared_array_ptr a = boost::any_cast<shared_array_ptr>(data);
00023                     value_type* arr = a->array().get();
00024                     return serialize::ConstPtrResult::make(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(arr),
00025                                                            a->size()*sizeof(value_type));
00026                 }
00027 
00028                 static boost::any deserialize(datastruct::MutableCharArray_ptr serialized)
00029                 {
00030                     value_type* data = reinterpret_cast<value_type*>(serialized->data);
00031                     shared_array_ptr arr = boost::make_shared<shared_array_type>(boost::shared_array<value_type>(data),
00032                                                                                  serialized->size/sizeof(value_type));
00033                     return arr;
00034                 }
00035         };
